clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in liver, suggestive of malignancy.
Mild inflammatory uptake in liver region.
recommendations: Biopsy or follow-up imaging may be considered to confirm malignancy.
